Shivah::

"I'll open the door that leads to the lab 15, where you and Silver 
scout can use the crs" said SHivah "Try to find the cure of the virus"

Shivah open the door that lead to that lab, and that lab was 
insolated and just a corridor contacted thelab with the fortress.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Blaze heard the comm but decided she was to close to escaping to 
turn back
> now. "Commander, Silver Scout and I are cut off from the CR room by 
the
> lockdown." I'm going to have to take the long way around to get 
back." she
> was hopeing to buy some time for herself and her new friend, after 
all if
> one of them was scrapped for haveing the virus the other one would 
be too.
> "I'll contact you when I get there. Blaze out." The Tigress cut
> communications as she slowly worked her way towards the exit.
> 
> Lunarpine transformed to robot mode as the call came through. The 
bot
> released his claws ready for the next barrage from the 
autoguns. "I've given
> you all the peacefull solutions I can think of, if you have any 
better ideas
> then I'm listening."
